amarikanuwan 1914 di kisiwakuge paththak gena nositi athara bahuthara amarikanuwange jiwithaye edineda katayuthu walata amathara winodanshaya wi thibune ee wana witath janapriyathama panayak wu kokakola panaya, motar ratha bhawithaya ha besbol tharanga narambaimen lada winodayayi.
me wayasedi kapi penena deyak wanne obe kuda daruwa katha kirimata ha ohuge athdakim beda ganimata patan ganimayi.
meya awasana arbudaya no wana athara meya pawathme anthima tharjanaya da nowe.
aahara karmanthaya da, nidasunak lesa winakiri, gowa achcharu (sawu krut nam jarman achcharu), soya sos, chis, yogat, pan saha madhyasara bima warga nishpadanayedi kshudra jiwin yoda gane.
janadhipathiwaranayata tharaga kala pamanin jathika wirayaku bhayanaka drohiyaku wanne keseda yanna thawa tikak tharkanukulawa penwa denne nam hoda ya.
balayalath niyojithaya paththaka iddi wena kenek namayojana bhara dila.
ee nisa niwase gruha himiyata wadi balapamak ella karana, mangul gala gana sakahara danaganima obe yahapatha pinisa hethu we.
atham aya pawasanne dostharawaran beheth nishpadana aayathana samanga sambandhatha athi nisa ema beheth warga alewikara ganimata memagin anugrahaya dakwana bawaya.

polonnaruwe wijayaramaye sithuwam nima kirimen anathuruwa andi kalani wiharaye sithuwam soliyas mandis wisin thiwanka pilima geyi sithuwam adhyanaya karamin kala nirmana bawa kalani wiharayehi budupilima, sithuwam hi iriyaw, ha warna bhawithaya wimasimen pahadili we.maha wanshaye sandahan ithihasaya budun kalaniyata wadi awasthawa thek kathandarayak lesa nirmanaya kala soliyas mendis pradhana wihara geyi hindi pilimaya depasa wu kuti deka pura nidahas sithiwili walin yuthuwa jiwamana pramanaye sithuwam nirmanaya kaleya.

ehidi shri lanka podujana peramunata sahaya dakwana palath sabha manthriwaru ema pakshaye samajikathwaya labaganimata niyamitha athara ema palath sabha manthriwarunta paksha samajikathwaya pirinamime uthsawaya ada (04 da) perawaruwe hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen baththaramulla nelum mawatha shri lanka podujana peramuna paksha mulasthanayedi pawathwimata katayuthu yoda thibe.

me wana wita lankawa thula fenshuyi wanchakaruwan sidukala prodawa janathawatama watahi moda ayurin fenshuyi bhawitha kirima shunya wi athath nawatha pasukaleka mema prodawa wenath muhunuwarakin ho ismathu wiya haka.ehi anisi balapamen idiri paramparawa mudaganu pinisa mema satahana thabana ladi.fenshuyi gana liyawunu mema lipiya 2009 pebarawari 15 dina irida lakbima puwathpathata ma wisinma liyu lipiyak nawatha sanshodhanaya kara liyana laddaki.antharjalaya thulin idiriyedi kawurun ho "fenshuyi" gana lipi soyana wita mema lipiyada kiyawimata ida labewa!

dakwayi.ෙmahi suwiesheshithwaya nam ෙmaya nuthana dijital thakshanaya ha eeta wada itha siyum naenothakshanayatacha wada sukshamawimayi.ෙm yateth pamanaya kala ෙnohaki athi wishala daththa sankha ාwakemoleyahi gabadakalada kisiwietakath in ෙmoley mathaka dharithawata kisidu awama balapamak ෙhoathienowimayi.ෙm thakshanaya manawa ෙmola wa hayathula pamanak anthargathawuwaki.kisidu dienakaathi diyunu kisidu yanthika ෙmawalamakata ෙho athi nawina supiri pariganakayakata labadiya ෙnohakiwumathaka dharithawayaki.yemaku jiwathwa innathak daththa pamanak ෙnowa bhawaya purama ananthawu sasarasarisariemdi manasata ukahaganna lada pin,paw,kusala ha akusala aadi siyalu smarana daththa gabadamanawa ෙmoleyahi kisidu apahasuwakin ෙthorawa thanpath kalahakiya.epamanak ෙnowa in idiriyatathawath sasarasarisara ෙkadinaka ෙho niwan dakna jathidakwa yamthakwu smarana ෙwathnam ee siyalusmaranayanma daththa ෙlasin ෙmoleyahi thanpathkara thabagatha haki ෙlasa minis ෙmoley wa hayanirmanayawi thieb.ෙmahi suwiesheshithawaya nam awasha wietaka ෙm oonama daththayak yali smaranayatanangagatha haki ෙlasa rasayanika wa ha ෙlasa ෙmoleyahi thanpathwa athibawayi.ෙkenaku ෙmohanayakirieman gambauru swapna nidawakata lakkirieman ෙho sieth gambauru samadhi mattamwaladi awasha wuwietaka ෙm smarana daththa yali aawarjana kirimata hakiya.rasayanika pathikiya mangin nirmanayawanasiyum rasayanika wa ha nisa sulu idakadaka wishala smarana daththa pamanayak pahasuewan gabadakalahakiya.ෙkenaku wiyapathwa miyayana ෙthakma haki uparima smarana daththa pamanayak masthishkayathulagabada kalada,ෙmoleyahi saba hakiyaewan eesandaha wayewanuey 1/100,000 th adu pamanayakbawa samana piliganimayi.ෙmolaya uparima karyakshathawayakin kiyakaraddi wayewanuey ee tharamsulu pamanayak nam,ෙmoley saba dharithawa sithagatha ෙnohaki tharam suwishalabawa pahadiliew.masthishkayathula pihiti athi siyum snayu ෙksha nalika thulin snayu aaෙwga samepeshanaya wanueysangnya ෙlasaya.eෙse wuwada snayu aaෙwga sangnya paridedan adala snayu thulin gamankaranuey ehiagakara langawana ෙthak pamani.snayu aga athara kuda parathara athi ෙse eewa pihita atha.ෙm paratharaatharin thawaduratath snayu samepeshana sangnya ෙse gaman ෙnogani.ee ෙwanuwata siduwanuey ෙm sangnyarasayanika pathikiya bawata pariwarthanayawimaki.ෙm sandaha awasha rasayanika dawa ema snayu nalikaagawala kuda kutirawala pihita thieb.snayu aaෙwgayak paminiwita ෙm kutira wiwarawa rasayanikadawanidahasew.masthishkey kiyawaliya niyamakareyan siduwimata ෙm rasayanikadawa samabarawa pawathiyayuthuya.yam ෙhayakin rasayanika dawa wala uunathawayak athiwuwehoth manasika samabarathawaya bindiyayi.saralawa artha dakwu wita manasika ෙrogi thathwayak ෙlasa handinewanuey ෙmabandu awasthawaki.ෙmabandu rasayanika dawa yanhi asamabarathawaya pahadiliwa wida mana wana awasthawak nam smaranayatawiwidha gatalu,badhakari thathwayan pana nangimayi.manesahi asamabarathawayak athiwu witakadi smaranakiyawalieyahi pahadili binda watimak nirikshanayawanuey ෙm ෙhethuwa nisaya.smaranaya manawa thibimasamabara manasika ෙsaukha thathwayakin pasuwana bawata pahadili sadhakayaki.106
